Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 81 of 197 2622
LCHCmax3
Young - cross
1 (In open court)
2 MS. MENNINGER: Your Honor, can we strike the answer?
3 THE COURT: Jury will disregard the answer regarding
4 the agent's training in conducting interviews with children to gather information.
5
6 MS. COMEY: I'll move on, your Honor.
7
8 BY MS. COMEY:
9 Q. Agent Young, did you participate in all of Jane's interviews with law enforcement?
10
11 A. Yes, I did.
12 Q. During those interviews, was Jane able to talk about everything that happened with Maxwell and Epstein in a single meeting or did she disclose more over time?
13
14 A. No, she wasn't able to talk about everything in one meeting. It was a process and she disclosed at different points.
15
16 Q. Did you ever have to stop interviews with Jane when discussing abuse involving Epstein and Maxwell?
17
18 MS. MENNINGER: Objection, your Honor. Beyond the scope.
19
20 THE COURT: Sustained.
21
22 Q. Were you able to cover everything that Jane remembered about Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell in a single interview?
23
24 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00014187

text_blocks.content:
(In open court)
MS. MENNINGER: Your Honor, can we strike the answer?
THE COURT: Jury will disregard the answer regarding
the agent's training in conducting interviews with children to gather information.
MS. COMEY: I'll move on, your Honor.
THE COURT: Thank you.
BY MS. COMEY:
Q. Agent Young, did you participate in all of Jane's interviews with law enforcement?
A. Yes, I did.
Q. During those interviews, was Jane able to talk about everything that happened with Maxwell and Epstein in a single meeting or did she disclose more over time?
A. No, she wasn't able to talk about everything in one meeting. It was a process and she disclosed at different points.
Q. Did you ever have to stop interviews with Jane when discussing abuse involving Epstein and Maxwell?
MS. MENNINGER: Objection, your Honor. Beyond the scope.
THE COURT: Sustained.
Q. Were you able to cover everything that Jane remembered about Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell in a single interview?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and readable format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
